snippet: State Senator Chris McDaniel asked the Mississippi Supreme Court on Monday for an emergency order forcing the Harrison County circuit clerk, Gayle Parker, to let him see original copies of poll books.
abstract: Mississippi State Sen Chris McDaniel, who narrowly lost Republican primary runoff to United States Sen Thad Cochran, asks Mississippi Supreme Court for emergency order forcing Harrison County circuit clerk Gayle Parker to let him see original copies of poll books.
lead_paragraph: State Senator Chris McDaniel asked the Mississippi Supreme Court on Monday for an emergency order forcing the Harrison County circuit clerk, Gayle Parker, to let him see original copies of poll books.
